backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining all data types (User, Task, List, MorningRoutine, SpendRecord, etc.) and canister logic for a personal productivity app with task management, routines, earnings tracking, and access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming implementation of a visual drop indicator line for task drag-and-drop reordering in EisenhowerMatrix, CustomLists, and TaskCard components, matching existing MorningRoutine behavior.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Structured summaries of all frontend source files describing component responsibilities, prop interfaces, and key behavioral details for the Momentum task management app.
frontend/docs/task-toggle-audit.md: Audit document identifying latency sources in task completion toggles (synchronous backend wait, blanket query invalidation, heavy validation) and recommending optimistic updates matching the routine pattern.
frontend/docs/test-date-removal-plan.md: Step-by-step plan for removing the temporary test date override feature used to debug routine daily rollover and streak logic, scoped only to routine-related files.
frontend/index.css: Root CSS file defining Tailwind base imports and OKLCH CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes including background, foreground, chart, and sidebar tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Momentum PWA with viewport-fit cover, iOS/Android PWA meta tags, manifest link, and app icon references.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA web app manifest for Momentum defining name, theme color, standalone display mode, portrait orientation, and 192/512px icon assets.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing network-first caching strategy with install-time pre-caching of core assets and fallback to cached index.html for offline navigation.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that manages top-level view state switching between TaskManager and AdminDashboard, wrapped in ThemeProvider with Toaster and OfflineIndicator.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDashb: Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminUserD: Admin panel component that lists all users in a paginated, searchable table and allows promoting/demoting admin roles and changing user tiers.
frontend/src/components/admin/StorageMon: Admin component that displays overall canister storage metrics and a paginated per-user storage breakdown table with copy-to-clipboard support for principals.
frontend/src/components/admin/TierSettin: Admin component for viewing and updating per-tier limits (max tasks, lists, routines) for each user tier, with unlimited toggle switches and save-per-tier functionality.
frontend/src/components/AuthBootstrapLoa: Simple full-screen loading spinner component displayed during authentication initialization.
frontend/src/components/BottomNavigation: Bottom navigation bar component with a long-press-activated FAB menu, plan mode toggle, and action buttons for adding tasks/lists, settings, earnings, spend plan, insights, and user info.
frontend/src/components/CreateListDialog: A modal dialog component for creating a new custom task list, with a controlled text input for the list name and submit/cancel actions.
frontend/src/components/CreateTaskDialog: An empty file with no content, likely a placeholder for a task creation dialog component.
frontend/src/components/CustomLists.tsx: Renders user-defined task lists in a scrollable layout with drag-and-drop reordering support, per-list drop indicators, and actions for creating, deleting, and editing tasks and lists.
frontend/src/components/EditTaskDialog.t: A modal dialog for editing an existing task's title, description, list assignment, urgency, importance, and completion status, with delete support.
frontend/src/components/EisenhowerMatrix: Renders a 2x2 Eisenhower priority matrix with drag-and-drop task reordering across quadrants, expandable view, and plan mode support.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: A simple footer component displaying a copyright notice and a link to caffeine.ai with a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: App header with Internet Identity authentication, user profile display, admin access, theme toggle, test date picker, and new-day reset functionality via a dropdown menu.
frontend/src/components/InsightsDialog.t: A dialog showing spending insights with tabbed views (spend, earning, task), time-period filtering, and a bar chart visualization of spend records.
frontend/src/components/MonetarySettings: An empty file with no content, likely a placeholder for a monetary settings dialog component.
frontend/src/components/MorningRoutine.t: Renders a morning or evening routine section with drag-and-drop reordering, checkbox completion tracking, add/delete dialogs, and collapsible/two-column display modes.
frontend/src/components/OfflineIndicator: Displays a full-screen overlay when the browser loses internet connectivity, listening to the window online/offline events.
frontend/src/components/PayrollHistoryDi: Dialog that lists payroll records sorted by date, allowing users to edit totals inline or submit pending payroll entries.
frontend/src/components/PlanModeTipDialo: Informational dialog that explains Plan Mode features such as dragging tasks between lists and reordering within a list.
frontend/src/components/SettingsDialog.t: Settings dialog for configuring the monetary earnings system, including sliders to allocate daily money limits across morning routine, daily priorities, and evening routine categories.
Dialog for logging spending entries via quick-add presets or custom amounts, with preset management (create/edit/delete) and a confirmation step before saving.
frontend/src/components/TaskCard.tsx: A memoized task card component supporting drag-and-drop (mouse and touch), edit/delete/complete actions, and a long-press-to-edit mode for mobile, with edit state lifted to the parent via `editTaskId`/`setEditTaskId`.
frontend/src/components/TestDatePicker.t: A visually distinct test-only date picker dropdown that lets developers select a simulated date from the last 31 days, clearly labeled 'TEST' to avoid confusion with production UI.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: A simple icon button that toggles between light and dark themes using `next-themes`, displaying a sun or moon icon based on the current theme.
frontend/src/components/TodayEarnsDialog: A dialog that calculates and displays the user's daily income breakdown from tasks and morning/evening routines, and allows submitting a payroll entry with the computed total.
frontend/src/components/UnauthenticatedS: The login/landing screen shown to unauthenticated users, featuring app feature highlights, a login button, registered user count, and an admin bootstrap URL display when an admin token is present in the URL.
frontend/src/components/UniversalAddTask: A dialog for creating tasks either via Eisenhower Matrix quadrant selection or by choosing a custom list, with fields for title, description, urgency, importance, and long-task flag.
frontend/src/components/UserInfoDialog.t: A dialog for viewing and editing the user's account profile, specifically allowing the user to update their email address with validation and save feedback via toasts.
frontend/src/components/UserProfileSetup: A form component that collects a new user's name and email, validates inputs, and saves the profile via the `useSaveCallerUserProfile` mutation with a basic tier.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an `InternetIdentityProvider` context and `useInternetIdentity` hook that manage Internet Identity authentication state, login, and logout using `@dfinity/auth-client`.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlanModeTip.ts: Hook that manages whether to show a 'plan mode tip' dialog to a user, using per-user localStorage keys with migration support from a legacy global key.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Central collection of React Query hooks (queries and mutations) for all backend data operations including user profiles, tasks, lists, routines, monetary settings, payroll, spend records, and admin functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useTestDate.ts: Test-only hook that provides a date override mechanism stored in sessionStorage, used to simulate different dates for testing routine rollover and streak logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that defines Tailwind base/component/utility layers, CSS custom properties for light and dark themes using OKLCH colors, and utility classes for drag interactions, safe-area insets, and streak animations.
frontend/src/lib/types.ts: Defines extended local types (LocalTask, LocalList) that augment backend types with a localId string for React keys, plus helper functions to convert between backend and local representations.
frontend/src/lib/userTier.ts: Utility functions for working with UserTier enum values, providing label strings, a full list of tiers, and the ordered tier array.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin-only page with tabs for user directory, tier settings, and storage monitoring; shows an unauthorized message with setup instructions if the caller is not an admin.
frontend/src/pages/TaskManager.tsx: Main application page that orchestrates task, list, routine, earnings, and spend management, rendering the appropriate UI based on authentication state and user profile, with numerous dialog components and drag-and-drop support.
frontend/src/utils/dailyPrioritiesEarnin: Calculates Daily Priorities income by applying quadrant-based scaling divisors (based on planned weight thresholds) to completed task weights, then multiplying by a unit derived from total planned weight.
frontend/src/utils/dragPayload.ts: Provides utilities to write and read drag-and-drop task payloads (taskId, sourceListId) to/from DataTransfer using a custom MIME type with a text/plain fallback.
frontend/src/utils/tierErrors.ts: Parses backend tier-limit errors for tasks, routines, and custom lists into user-friendly messages prompting upgrades.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities to extract URL parameters from query strings or hash-based routes, persist them in sessionStorage, and clean sensitive params from the URL bar.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with dark mode, custom OKLCH-based color tokens, border radius, accordion keyframes, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project state for the Momentum app, noting a pending fix request to add a visual drop indicator line to task drag-and-drop reordering to match existing routine behavior.
